That's what happened, yeah?
 Just like that on day one, Anya?

No time again?
 Sergey, medicine's progressed so far.

pa:
Got friends? Good grades?
 -He's homeschooled. - Hmm.

pa: Yeah.

pa: He's very talented.

Mmm, just, uh--
 Sorry, but what's all this heart-to-heart talk, if you don't mind?

Oh…
 Anya's had too much to drink today.

...ca nhiễm khắp cả nước...

là nhà virus học, Giáo sư Pakhomov Vsevolod Mikhaylovich.

That is, you know, that is the main peculiarity.
 The symptoms are also quite unusual. Rapid infection of the lungs,

The government has the problem completely under control.

Wait, what just happened?
 - Are you feeling depressed? -Did they cut him off?

This is unacceptable. Why are you guys wearing masks?

Con quý vị không sao. Lùi lại đi.
 Chúng sẽ sớm được thả về.

vi:
Vâng.
 - Có mấy lớp này thôi? - Vâng.

- We're in the school.

Get a hold of yourself.

- Anh... - Cô bình tĩnh đi.
 Cô có việc cô, bọn tôi có việc bọn tôi. Để cho bác sĩ lo.

Okay?

Không sao đâu.
